channel.title: Error: Could not find or load the main class Client (once again)
channel.description:
Error: Could not find or load the main class Client Press any key to continue. . .
Here is my run.bat:
@echo off title Client cd bin java -Xmx512m client 30 0 highmem members 32 pause
And my client folder: [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/9k02de.png[/img]
I don't see what could possibly be wrong, could anyone try helping? Thank's in advance.

item.title: Error: Could not find or load the main class Client (once again)
item.dc:creator: @hi_im_bamf hi im bamf
item.description:
@hi_im_bamf wrote:

Error: Could not find or load the main class Client
Press any key to continue. . .

Here is my run.bat:

@echo off
title Client
cd bin
java -Xmx512m client 30 0 highmem members 32
pause

And my client folder:

9k02de.png926×682

I don’t see what could possibly be wrong, could anyone try helping? Thank’s in advance.
